overview: Eddie Moroney, while suffering the mother and father of all hangovers, gave the commentary of his life at the Tipperary Under 21 football final between his beloved Aherlow and Eire Og Nenagh in 1993. This is the amazing true story of a hilarious GAA match commentary which became famous worldwide, selling thousands of match tapes and DVDs. Effin Eddie has now become an internet phenomenon.
tagline: The amazing true story of a hilarious GAA match commentary which has become famous worldwide
title: The Legend of Effin Eddie
